title: Analysis of Angi Inc's Management Team

content.text: Oisin Hanrahan is the CEO of Angi Inc and has been instrumental in leading the company towards growth and success. He has extensive experience in the technology industry and has successfully guided the company through various strategic expansions and acquisitions. Hanrahan's vision and leadership have been vital in driving Angi Inc's strategic direction.

Jamie Cohen serves as the CFO of Angi Inc and is responsible for managing the company's financial operations and strategies. Cohen brings a wealth of financial expertise to the team, enabling effective financial planning and decision-making. His role is crucial in maintaining financial stability and growth for Angi Inc.

Ken DeDecker is the Chief Technology Officer of Angi Inc, overseeing the company's technological advancements and innovation. With his deep knowledge of technology trends, DeDecker plays a crucial role in driving the company's product development and technical strategies. His contributions are vital in ensuring Angi Inc remains competitive in the evolving marketplace.

Shannon Shaw assumes the role of Chief Marketing Officer, responsible for Angi Inc's marketing strategies and initiatives. Shaw's expertise in brand management and customer acquisition contributes to the company's strategic direction and performance. She plays a critical role in building strong customer relationships and driving growth.

Anna Steffeney serves as the Chief Human Resources Officer of Angi Inc, focusing on the company's human capital strategies. Steffeney's leadership ensures the organization has the right talent, fosters a positive work culture, and promotes employee development. Her role contributes to Angi Inc's performance and long-term sustainability.

Brandon Ridenour is Angi Inc's Chief Strategy Officer, responsible for driving the company's overall strategic initiatives and partnerships. Ridenour's strategic vision and expertise in identifying growth opportunities contribute significantly to Angi Inc's strategic direction. His role is essential in shaping the company's future growth and competitive positioning.

The management team of Angi Inc, led by CEO Oisin Hanrahan and supported by key executives such as CFO Jamie Cohen, CTO Ken DeDecker, CMO Shannon Shaw, CHRO Anna Steffeney, and CSO Brandon Ridenour, plays a crucial role in shaping the company's strategic direction and performance. Their collective expertise and leadership contribute to Angi Inc's growth, innovation, financial stability, marketing strategies, human resources, and overall long-term success.

news.headline: IAC to Participate in the Oppenheimer 27th Annual Technology, Internet & Communications Conference
news.summary: IAC (NASDAQ: IAC) will participate in the Oppenheimer 27th Annual Technology, Internet & Communications Conference on Tuesday, August 13, 2024. Christopher Halpin, Executive Vice President, CFO and COO of IAC will participate in a fireside chat at 1:15 p.m. ET. Both a live webcast and replay of the fireside chat will be available to the public in the IR section of IAC's website at https://ir.iac.com/events-and-presentations.

news.headline: Why Angi (ANGI) Stock Is Trading Up Today
news.summary: Shares of home services online marketplace ANGI (NASDAQ: ANGI) jumped 28.8% in the morning session after the company reported second quarter earnings results. Angi beat analysts' revenue and service request expectations this quarter, but we note that sales growth was quite weak, and requests declined. Overall, this was a decent quarter for Angi.

news.headline: Angi (NASDAQ:ANGI) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q2 But Requests Fall
news.summary: Home services online marketplace ANGI (NASDAQ: ANGI) reported Q2 CY2024 results beating Wall Street analysts' expectations, with revenue down 16% year on year to $315.1 million. It made a GAAP profit of $0.01 per share, improving from its loss of $0.03 per share in the same quarter last year.

news.headline: Angi Inc. Earnings Release Available on Company’s Website
news.summary: DENVER, Aug. 06, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Angi Inc. (NASDAQ: ANGI) posted its second quarter financial results on the investor relations section of its website at ir.angi.com/quarterly-earnings. As announced previously, Angi Inc. and IAC will host a conference call to discuss both companies’ respective second quarter results and to answer questions.
